title: Eldritch Energy Source (Part 2)
body:
Eldritch Energy Source (Part 2)

"Damn, now I don't even have the power to lift a finger, but this place..." Evan muttered in a tired voice as he slumped down to the ground once the rift was closed.

After dropping to the ground, he looked around and saw the Eldritch Energy that came out of the rift had spread in an area of more than five hundred kilometres. He was already out of both Primordial Shadow Energy and the World Essence, so it was impossible for him to stay in the place corrupted by the Eldritch Energy for a prolonged period of time.

Moreover, during this entire time, his body was facing the pressure released by the Eldritch Creature.

Earlier, he didn't feel anything because he was trying to think of a way to close the rift, but now that the rift was completely closed, he was finally feeling the aftereffects of facing such great pressure. Every single muscle in his body was screaming in pain, and his blood flow was completely unstable.
